name: Sergio de Candelario
body:
### Welcome to my page
Hello, I'm a boy from Barcelona. I love all around the PHP and web development world.

I'm a PHP & Symfony developer, every day I trying to make things better. Always find a little space of time to read news, and try new things.

I am a big fan of Symfony and think with the integration and doctrine you can make things easy. I'm interested in the live meetings and the talks about the new things around the development world.

And if i can help you in anything, or something in my repositories can help you, only say to me :)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
